title: I cant wait for league to die
body: This game used to be so fun it actually involved skill but every patch riot makes is just ruining the game more and more. They wont listen to the player base their balancing team is a joke and it just keeps getting worse and worse. Obviously riots a bad company so atleast when league dies a new  game with a better company will be the number one game

replies.body:
1. you either still play and contradict yourself.

2. you stay stalking the boards when you don't play the game which  is just as sad.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
also you have to play a game to know its trash

> [{quoted}](name=twstd whirlwind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-19T21:16:29.889+0000)
>
> also you have to play a game to know its trash

Then why do you keep playing?
Same reason why people cant quit smoking. Does that mean smoking is good for you?. Wish you people stopped asking this stupid questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Awhegark,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-19T22:55:06.664+0000)
>
> Same reason why people cant quit smoking. Does that mean smoking is good for you?. Wish you people stopped asking this stupid questions.

So because you lack the willpower to quit, that is the game’s fault?

> [{quoted}](name=Awhegark,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-19T22:55:06.664+0000)
>
> Same reason why people cant quit smoking. Does that mean smoking is good for you?. Wish you people stopped asking this stupid questions.

So because said people are weak willed, that's a terrible excuse.
the only person that has a brain^

> [{quoted}](name=twstd whirlwind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-19T21:06:52.224+0000)
>
> your points are retarded why even reply? i play this shit game with my friends sometimes and because i used to play it when it was good

so you stay on the forums of a trash game after you've quit playing to stay shit talking it? or you keep playing with friends, are you sure my points are retarded, or you just don't like how true they are so you got to try to insult? hmmm think about it tiny man

no your points just dumb obviously i have to play the game to know its trash and im definitely not the only one realizing the game is trash look at all the forum posts. also your so passive aggresive it hurts. "tiny man" lmao

> [{quoted}](name=twstd whirlwind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2018-05-19T21:56:29.227+0000)
>
> no your points just dumb obviously i have to play the game to know its trash and im definitely not the only one realizing the game is trash look at all the forum posts. also your so passive aggresive it hurts. "tiny man" lmao

So you keep playing a game that you want to die; you know you have to stop playing a game for it to die right? keep the logic coming bud.
obviously im gonna play this game if my friends ask me to play? are you retarded?

> [{quoted}](name=twstd whirlwind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-20T01:34:50.622+0000)
>
> obviously im gonna play this game if my friends ask me to play? are you retarded?

So your friends force you to play a game you don’t enjoy, sound like bad friends to me.
if my friends are gonna play a game im gonna play with them not make them play what i want to play .

> [{quoted}](name=twstd whirlwind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=00000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-20T05:03:12.234+0000)
>
> if my friends are gonna play a game im gonna play with them not make them play what i want to play .

If you wouldn't make your friends play a game that you don't want to play, why would they do that to you?
im not gonna be some selfish kid that makes all my friends play what i want to play if they are already playing a game together guessing you dont have friends so you cant really relate.

> [{quoted}](name=twstd whirlwind,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7x1oHYQ8,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-20T14:52:03.952+0000)
>
> im not gonna be some selfish kid that makes all my friends play what i want to play if they are already playing a game together guessing you dont have friends so you cant really relate.

Me or any of my friends don't force each other to play games we don't have fun with, because we are friends. Some of us like ARK, some of us hate it, some of us like League, some of us hate it.

I repeat, if your friends force you to play a game you don't enjoy, they aren't good friends, nor are you for doing vice versa. 

Stop making excuses on why you play the game and stop playing if you honestly don't like it.

ok you should probably stop replying cause i dont think your brain can comprehend what im saying. if my friends are all playing league im gonna join them and talk to them. not a hard concept to understand
how many $$ are spelled in "bad company" ?
Have fun waiting.
